supplyDemandQuery.title: Water Withdrawals (Domestic)
supplyDemandQuery.xPath: *[@type='sector' and (@name='domestic water' or @name='municipal water')]//*[@type='input' and (@name='water withdrawals')]/demand-physical/node()

supplyDemandQuery.title: Water Withdrawals (Industrial - Electricity)
supplyDemandQuery.xPath: *[@type='sector' and not(local-name()='AgSupplySector') and not(@name='domestic water' or @name='municipal water') and not(@name='industrial energy use' or @name='industrial feedstocks' or @name='industry') and not(@name='Beef' or @name='Dairy' or @name='Pork' or @name='Poultry' or @name='SheepGoat') and not (contains(@name, 'regional coal') or contains(@name, 'nuclearFuelGenIII') or contains(@name, 'regional natural gas') or contains(@name, 'unconventional oil production') or contains(@name, 'regional oil') or contains(@name, 'nuclearFuelGenII'))]//*[@type='input' and contains(@name,'water withdrawals')]/demand-physical/node()

supplyDemandQuery.title: Water Withdrawals (Livestock)
supplyDemandQuery.xPath: *[@type='sector' and (@name='Beef' or @name='Dairy' or @name='Pork' or @name='Poultry' or @name='SheepGoat')]//*[@type='input' and (@name='water withdrawals')]/demand-physical/node()

supplyDemandQuery.title: Water Withdrawals (Resource Extraction)
supplyDemandQuery.xPath: *[@type='sector' and (contains(@name, 'regional coal') or contains(@name, 'nuclearFuelGenIII') or contains(@name, 'regional natural gas') or contains(@name, 'unconventional oil production') or contains(@name, 'regional oil') or contains(@name, 'nuclearFuelGenII'))]//*[@type='input' and (@name='water withdrawals')]/demand-physical/node()
